objects.name: Initiate Reservation
objects.description: The client selects services and confirms the reservation by finalizing the booking.

objects.name: Verify Payment Method
objects.description: System verifies the payment method with the financial institution.
objects.solution: Implement temporary manual payment verification process.

objects.name: Security Screening
objects.description: System conducts a security screening to ensure the transaction is secure.

objects.name: Confirm Payment
objects.description: The financial institution confirms payment after the security screening.

objects.name: Check Service Availability
objects.description: The Reservation System verifies and confirms the availability of the requested services.

objects.name: Send Reservation Confirmation Email
objects.description: The client receives an email confirming the reservation and its details.

objects.name: Dispatch to Service Provider
objects.description: The Reservation System sends the reservation details to the service provider for preparation.

objects.name: Acknowledge by Service Provider
objects.description: The service provider acknowledges receipt of the reservation and starts preparation.

objects.name: Prepare Services
objects.description: The service provider prepares the necessary services as per the reservation.

objects.name: Update Reservation Status
objects.description: The Reservation System updates the status of the reservation after preparation.

objects.name: Provide Services
objects.description: The services are provided to the client as per the reservation details.

objects.name: Send Service Delivery Email
objects.description: The client receives an email confirming the delivery of the services.

objects.name: Confirm Payment Receipt
objects.description: The system confirms that payment has been received for the services.

objects.name: Finalize Payment
objects.description: The Payment Processing System finalizes the payment for the services.

objects.name: Generate Receipt
objects.description: The Reservation System generates a receipt for the provided services.

objects.name: Update Financial Records
objects.description: The Financial Management System, including the Revenue Management module, is updated with the transaction details.

objects.name: Complete Service Delivery
objects.description: The client receives the completed services, marking the end of the Reservation E2E Process.

objects.name: Manual Payment Verification
objects.description: Temporary manual process for verifying payments during financial institution outages.
objects.solution: A temporary manual payment verification process to maintain service continuity.

objects.name: Manual Payment Confirmation
objects.description: Temporary manual confirmation process for payments during financial institution outages.
objects.solution: A temporary manual payment confirmation process to maintain service continuity.

to.solution: Implement temporary manual verification for payment.
